description: Jeff Koons made this work for a suite exploring concepts of love, referencing his marriage to Italian porn star Ilona Staller. He explained, “I wanted . . . to bring Ilona’s body and my body down together in a point so that it’s a heart—a symbol of love—and take the flesh and cut through it . . . without any sense of violence.” Koons made the double portrait in the 18-century Baroque style.
title: Bourgeois Bust- Jeff and Ilona
